Monster.Name: Nothic
Monster.Description: Nothics were once wizards who dared to unlock magical secrets they couldn't fathom. Though gifted with strange cosmic insight that allows them to extract knowledge from other creatures, nothics are no longer the wizards they once were and have no memories of their previous lives.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: The nothic has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The nothic makes two claw attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Rotting Gaze
MonsterAction.Text: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Weird Insight
MonsterTrait.Text: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. of it. The target must contest its Charisma (Deception) check against the nothic's Wisdom (Insight) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being charmed.
